Feats: Alert; Great Weapon Master; Polearm Master; Savage Attacker; War Caster Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Wizard Features: Abjuration Savant; Alter Memories; Arcane Recovery; Arcane Tradition; Arcane Ward; Benign Transposition; Command Undead; Conjuration Savant; Divination Savant; Durable Summons; Empowered Evocation; Enchantment Savant; Evocation Savant; Expert Divination; Focused Conjuration; Greater Portent; Grim Harvest; Hypnotic Gaze; Illusion Savant; Illusory Reality; Illusory Self; Improved Abjuration; Improved Minor Illusion; Instinctive Charm; Inured To Undeath; Malleable Illusions; Master Transmuter; Minor Alchemy; Minor Conjuration; Necromancy Savant; Overchannel; Portent; Potent Cantrip; Projected Ward; Save Proficiency (Intelligence; Wisdom); School Of Abjuration; School Of Conjuration; School Of Divination; School Of Enchantment; School Of Evocation; School Of Illusion; School Of Necromancy; School Of Transmutation; Sculpt Spells; Shapechanger; Signature Spells; Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Religion); Spell Mastery; Spell Resistance; Spellcasting; Split Enchantment; The Third Eye; Transmutation Savant; Transmuter's Stone; Undead Thralls; Weapon Proficiency (Dagger; Dart; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling) Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Arcane Tradition: 1 selection
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Ptah and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: Insight; Religion
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 0 Insight: (wis) 7 Performance: (cha) 4
Animal Handling: (wis) 1 Intimidation: (cha) 4 Persuasion: (cha) 4
Arcana: (int) 2 Investigation: (int) 2 Religion: (int) 8
Athletics: (str) 2 Medicine: (wis) 1 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 0
Deception: (cha) 4 Nature: (int) 2 Stealth: (dex) 0
History: (int) 2 Perception: (wis) 1 Survival: (wis) 1
Languages: Common; Draconic; Giant; Halfling
Combat
Hit Points: 123 Initiative: 5 Armor Class: 10 Attacks Per Round: 1
Weapon Proficiency: Dagger; Dart; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Dart (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Quarterstaff (+8 1d8+2); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 4; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 0; Intelligence: 8; Strength: 2; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Inured To Undeath: Has resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction
Spell Resistance: Has advantage vs. spells and resistance to spell damage
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 8 Spell DC: W: 16
Spells:
Animate Dead (W3 [Undead Thralls] Necr): R10' Bones or the corpse of a Medium or Small creature becomes a skeleton or zombie that obeys commands when within 60' for 1 day [+Level animates +2 undead]
Arcane Eye (W4 Divi): R30' Self sees with darkvision through a remote invisible eye that can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 hr
Banishment (W4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Charm Person (W1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Dimension Door (W4 Conj): Teleports self and 1 adjacent willing creature up to 500'
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Inflicts 10d6+40 HP force and turns the target to dust if reduced to 0 HP (save Dexterity neg), or disintegrates a Large or smaller object or magical force [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target increases a size category, gaining advantage on Strength checks and +1d4 HP weapon damage, or decreases a size category, suffering disadvantage on Strength checks and -1d4 HP weapon damage (save Constitution neg), for concentration up to 1 min; can instead target an unattended object
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Gaseous Form (W3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Geas (W5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom neg) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Grease (W1 Conj): R60' 10' sq becomes difficult terrain and causes creatures to fall prone (save Dexterity neg) for 1 min
Invisibility (W2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Major Image (W3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level extends the duration to permanent at level 6]
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Sends the target to a labyrinthine demiplane (DC 20 Intelligence escapes; minotaurs and goristro demons automatically succeed) for concentration up to 10 min
Mending (W0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Minor Illusion (W0 [Improved Minor Illusion] Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mirror Image (W2 Illu): 3 duplicates (AC 10; damage destroys) allow misdirecting attacks on self with a 6, 8, or 11 on a d20 with 3, 2, or 1 remaining duplicate for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion (W7 Conj): R300' Self and designated creatures can enter an extradimensional dwelling containing provisions for 100 people for 1 day
Otiluke's Freezing Sphere (W6 Evoc): R300' 60' radius inflicts 10d6 HP cold (save Constitution half) and freezes water for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Phantom Steed (W3 Illu): R30' Conjures a mount that can be ridden by a designated creature 100' per rd (13 MPH) for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Poison Spray (W0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution neg)
Polymorph (W4 [Shapechanger] Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (save Wisdom neg; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Prismatic Wall (W9 Abju): R60' 90'x30' area blinds within 20' for 1 min (save Constitution neg); creatures passing through suffer 10d6 HP each fire, acid, lightning, poison, and cold (save Dexterity half), restraint (save Dexterity neg) and petrification after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg), and blindness (save Dexterity neg) and banishment to another plane (save Wisdom neg)
Raise Dead (W5 [Master Transmuter] Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Seeming (W5 Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma neg; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Uses snow to create an obedient copy of a target creature with half its hit points
Magic Notes:
Greater Portent: Can use Portent 3 times per long rest
Abjuration Savant: Can copy abjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Alter Memories: Chosen target becomes unaware of self charm; can also inflict forgetfulness of the preceding 5 hr (DC 16 Intelligence neg)
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Arcane Ward: After a long rest, can cause an abjuration spell to create a ward around self that can absorb 42 hit points; if exhausted, casting another abjuration spell restores 2x the spell level hit points to the ward
Benign Transposition: R30' Can teleport self or swap with a willing creature once per long rest or conjuration spell casting
Command Undead: R60' Can use an action to control an undead target (DC 16 Charisma neg permanently; targets with Intelligence of at least 8 have advantage on the save, and targets with Intelligence of at least 12 repeat the save every hr)
Conjuration Savant: Can copy conjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Divination Savant: Can copy divination spells into spellbook for half cost
Durable Summons: Summoned creatures gain 30 temporary HP
Empowered Evocation: +2 HP evocation spell damage
Enchantment Savant: Can copy enchantment spells into spellbook for half cost
Evocation Savant: Can copy evocation spells into spellbook for half cost
Expert Divination: Casting a divination spell restores a lower-level expended slot of up to level 5
Focused Conjuration: Damage cannot break conjuration concentration
Grim Harvest: Regains hit points equal to twice the spell level, or 3x for necromantic spells, when a self spell kills
Hypnotic Gaze: Can daze an adjacent creature (DC 16 Wisdom neg) while maintained once per target per long rest
Illusion Savant: Can copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Illusory Reality: Can use a bonus action to make a harmless object in a self illusion real for 1 min
Illusory Self: Can use a reaction to cause an attack on self to miss once per short rest
Improved Abjuration: +6 abjuration spell ability checks
Improved Minor Illusion: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip; effects can include both a sound and an image
Instinctive Charm: R30' Can use a reaction to redirect an attack on self to another (DC 16 Wisdom neg until a long rest)
Malleable Illusions: Can modify self illusions throughout their durations
Master Transmuter: Can destroy a transmuter's stone to transmute a 5' cube, remove curses, diseases, and poisons, cast Raise Dead, or restore youth
Minor Alchemy: Can change the substance of 1 cubic foot of matter per 10 min effort for concentration up to 1 hr
Minor Conjuration: R10' Can create a 3' cube inanimate object weighing up to 10 lb that emits 5' dim light and lasts for 1 hr or until it takes or deals damage
Necromancy Savant: Can copy necromancy spells into spellbook for half cost
Overchannel: Can inflict maximum damage from evocation spells up to level 5; doing so also inflicts 2d12+ HP necrotic damage per spell level on self for each use after the first until a long rest
Portent: Can replace a visible target's attack, ability, or saving throw with one of two pre-rolled values 3 times per long rest
Potent Cantrip: Cantrips inflict half HP on a successful save
Projected Ward: R30' Can use Arcane Ward to absorb damage to others
Sculpt Spells: Can give spell level + 1 creatures a successful save and no damage instead of half on a self spell
Shapechanger: Knows the Polymorph spell; can transform self into a CR 1 creature once per short rest
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and spend 8 hr to change the choices
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Split Enchantment: Can add a second target to an enchantment spell
The Third Eye: Can use an action to gain 60' darkvision, 60' ethereal sight, the ability to read any language, or 10' invisibility sight until the next rest, once each per short rest
Transmutation Savant: Can copy transmutation spells into spellbook for half cost
Transmuter's Stone: Can use an 8-hr process to create a stone that gives a choice of 60' darkvision, +10' Speed, proficiency on Constitution saves, or resistance to a chosen energy damage, and can change the effect of a possessed stone when casting a transmutation spell
Undead Thralls: Knows the Animate Dead spell; casting it animates an additional corpse and gives corpses +20 hit points and +6 HP weapon damage
War Caster: Has advantage on concentration saves to maintain a spell/Can cast when holding a shield or a weapon/Can use a reaction to cast as an opportunity attack in response to movement
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
